summary: This Helmet when equipped gives your character evil effects. READ LONG DESCRIPTION
descriptionHtml:
This Helmet when equipped gives your character evil effects. 

------------------------EFFECTS-------------------------
When put on your character gets glowing red eyes as well as a black corrupted mist or smoke coming off of your character.
--------------Location----------------
As soon as you enter Bleak Falls Barrow southwest of Whiterun there is a wraith that is holding the Helm Of Evil.
author: DemonLord7654
